thread.title: Kurt Russell saddles up for 'Bone Tomahawk,' 'Hateful Eight'
thread.title_full: Kurt Russell saddles up for 'Bone Tomahawk,' 'Hateful Eight'

title: Kurt Russell saddles up for 'Bone Tomahawk,' 'Hateful Eight'
text: > Entertainment Kurt Russell saddles up for 'Bone Tomahawk,''Hateful Eight' In this Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015 photo, actor Kurt Russell poses for a portrait at the Ambrose Hotel in Santa Monica, Calif. 22 years after "Tombstone," Russell gets back in the saddle for two new Westerns, the slow-burn cannibal indie "Bone Tomahawk," and Quentin Tarantino's "The Hateful Eight." Russell stars as Sheriff Franklin Hunt in "Bone Tomahawk" which opens in U.S. theaters on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP)
